setting.same-key: Enter the same value as the key

create-role.title: Create Role
create-role.description: Please enter a new role name.

delete-option.title: Delete Option
delete-option.description: This will not affect options in previous feedback.

delete-role.title: Delete Role
delete-role.description:
Are you sure you want to delete this role?
Members assigned to this role will also be removed.

create-project.title: Create Project
create-project.continue-channel-creation:
A channel must be created before using User Feedback.
Would you like to continue creating a channel?
create-project.alert-description: Shall you proceed to create a Channel?

create-channel.title: Create Channel
create-channel.alert-description: Congratulations! Now you are ready to start in earnest.

date.date-range-over-max-days: Inquiry period is limited to {{maxDays}} days

continue.title: Continue?
continue.description: A {{type}} is currently being created. Do you wish to continue? (Starting over will discard any existing information.)

total-feedback.title: Total Feedback
total-feedback.description: Total feedback received in a specific period ({{targetDate}}).

total-issue.title: Total Issues
total-issue.description: Total issues registered in a specific period ({{targetDate}}).

issue-ratio.title: Issue Registration Rate
issue-ratio.description: Percentage of feedback with registered issues ({{targetDate}}).

today-feedback.title: Today's Feedback
today-feedback.description:
Feedback received today ({{targetDate}}).
The increased/decreased rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

yesterday-feedback.title: Yesterday's Feedback
yesterday-feedback.description:
Feedback received yesterday ({{targetDate}}).
The increased/decreased rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

n-days-feedback.title: Last {{n}} Days' Feedback
n-days-feedback.description:
Feedback received in the last {{n}} days ({{targetDate}}).
The increased/decreased rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

today-issue.title: Today's Issues
today-issue.description:
Issues reported today ({{targetDate}}).
The increased/decreased rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

yesterday-issue.title: Yesterday's Issues
yesterday-issue.description:
Issues reported yesterday ({{targetDate}}).
The increased/decreased rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

n-days-issue.title: Last {{n}} Days' Issues
n-days-issue.description:
Issues reported in the last {{n}} days ({{targetDate}}).
The increased/decreased rate is compared to the following period. ({{compareDate}})

feedback-trend.title: Feedback Trends
feedback-trend.description: Shows the trend of feedback received over a specific time period.

issue-trend.title: Issue Trends
issue-trend.description: Shows the trend of issues reported over a specific time period.

issue-status-count.title: Issue Status Overview
issue-status-count.description: Shows the current status distribution of all issues.

issue-comparison.title: Issue Comparison
issue-comparison.description: Compares the trend of feedback for selected issues.

select-issue.max-issue-count: Up to five issues can be selected.

tooltip.issue-feedback-count: Count of feedback associated with this issue.
tooltip.feedback-date-picker-button: Search data based on the feedback generation date.
tooltip.issue-date-picker-button: Search data based on the issue registration date.
tooltip.dashboard-date-picker-button: Search data based on the feedback generation or issue registration date.

save-field.title: Save Field Management
save-field.description: Do you want to save the field information that you added or modified?

help-card.project-info: Project refers to the product targeted for feedback collection. Please enter information considering the product you want to manage feedback for.
help-card.member: You can register and manage Members who will participate in the Project.
help-card.api-key: This is the screen for managing User Feedback API Key. Please generate and use a Key to utilize the API. For details, please refer to the API <docs>Docs</docs>.
help-card.issue-tracker: This is the screen for setting up the connection between User Feedback and Issue Tracking System. Please enter the information for the Issue Tracking System you are using.
help-card.channel-info: Channel is a unit that distinguishes feedback collection paths or collection methods. Please enter information considering the characteristics of the Channel.
help-card.field: You can define feedback data to be collected in the Channel by Field units. Please add Fields considering the data type and properties.
help-card.image-config: When collecting feedback in Image format, this screen allows you to set up Image Storage integration and configure whitelist for Image URL domains. For details, please refer to the Image <docs>Docs</docs>.
help-card.field-preview: Provides a preview of what your feedback will look like based on registered Field information. The preview uses example data for reference.
help-card.webhook: This is the screen where you can set up Webhook integration according to event triggers occurring in User Feedback. For details, please refer to the Webhook <docs>Docs</docs>.
help-card.ai-setting: This is the screen for setting up the integration of Generative AI. To use AI features, essential information must be entered.
help-card.ai-usage: This is the screen for checking and managing token usage related to AI feature usage.
help-card.ai-field-template: This is the screen for defining the behavior of AI fields. You can enter instructions through templates and adjust advanced settings.
help-card.ai-issue-recommendation: This is the screen for setting up the AI issue recommendation feature. After detailed configuration per channel, you can use the AI issue recommendation feature.

hint.max-length: Please enter no more than {{length}} characters.
hint.name-already-exists: The name '{{name}}' is already in use.
hint.invalid-domain: Please use a valid domain format.
hint.image-format: The format for entering the Image URL.

delete.title: Do you want to delete?
delete.description: When deleted, all related information will disappear.

warn-if-unsaved-changes.title: Do you want to leave the page?
warn-if-unsaved-changes.description: If you leave in the middle, the entered content will not be saved.

warn-if-saved-changes.title: Do you want to leave the page?
warn-if-saved-changes.description: Even if you leave in the middle, you can continue later.

no-project-in-profile-page.title: No Project Assigned.
no-project-in-profile-page.description:
You are not assigned to any project yet.
Please request the project manager to register you as a member or inquire further.

no-project-dialog-in-project-creation-pa.title: Welcome!
no-project-dialog-in-project-creation-pa.step1-description: In ABC User Feedback, feedback is managed using a Channel > Project > Tenant structure. Therefore, you need to create both a Project and a Channel.
no-project-dialog-in-project-creation-pa.step2-description: A Project refers to the product that is the subject of feedback. It's good to create a Project based on the product information you manage.
no-project-dialog-in-project-creation-pa.step3-description: A Channel refers to the method of feedback collection. It's good to create a Channel based on how you collect feedback for the product you are responsible for.

no-data.api-key: No API Key has been generated.
no-data.filter: There is no results. Try changing the query or filter conditions.

text.required-step: This is a required input step. Please enter the required information.
text.optional-step: This is an optional input step. You can enter it again later in the settings menu.

tenant.title: Create Tenant
tenant.description: Please enter the name of the company/organization/team that will manage ABC User Feedback.

user.title: Create Master Account
user.description: You need to create a master account for the initial login.

final.title: Tenant Creation Complete
final.description:
Tenant creation is complete.
Now try logging in with the master account.

placeholder.ai-endpoint-url: Please enter only if a separate Endpoint URL configuration is required.
placeholder.system-prompt: If there is additional information that the Generative AI should refer to, please enter it.
placeholder.ai-field-template-prompt: Please enter instructions on how the Generative AI should process.
placeholder.ai-field-reccommendation-prompt: If there are additional instructions to request from the Generative AI, please enter them.

toast.ai-usage-limit-approaching: AI usage limit approaching for this month.
toast.ai-function-terminated-description: AI execution has been stopped due to exceeding token usage limit.

feedback-creation.title: Feedback Creation
feedback-creation.description: Every time feedback is collected, an event is triggered.

issue-addition.title: Issue Registration
issue-addition.description: Every time you register an issue, an event is triggered.

issue-status-change.title: Issue Status Change
issue-status-change.description: Every time you change the issue status, an event is triggered.

issue-creation.title: Issue Creation
issue-creation.description: Every time you create a new issue, an event is triggered.

description.create-project:
Project has been created successfully.
Next, you need to create a Channel to collect feedback.
Proceed to the next step through 'Create Channel'.
description.create-channel:
Channel has been created successfully.
Now you're ready to collect and manage user feedback.
Start experiencing it in full through 'Get Started'.
description.remaining-token-amount: To check the remaining token amount, please set a limit.
description.token-threshold: Set a limit for monthly token usage. If the limit is exceeded, AI functionality will be stopped.
description.pre-limit-notification: When the set threshold is reached, you will receive a notification about token usage. (Usage is reset on the 1st of every month.)
description.ai-field-template-form: Set the basic information for the template.
description.ai-field-template-advanced-configuration: You can change the connected model and temperature of the template.
description.ai-field-template-playground: You can preview AI results in advance using the template and test data.
description.ai-issue-recommendation-form: Set the basic information for AI issue recommendations.
description.ai-issue-recommendation-enable: Set whether to use the AI issue recommendation feature.
description.ai-issue-recommendation-advanced-configu: You can change the connected model, temperature, and data reference amount for AI issue recommendations.
description.ai-issue-recommendation-data-reference-a: You can adjust the amount of issue data that the Generative AI should reference for AI issue recommendations.
description.ai-issue-recommendation-playground: You can preview AI results in advance using the AI issue recommendation settings and test data.
description.ai-issue-recommendation-setting-required: The AI issue recommendation feature requires configuration. Please set it up to use the feature.

login-setting.oauth-description: Provides a way to log in using OAuth2.0.
login-setting.email-description: Provides a way to sign up and log in using email verification.
